channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Industrial Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Industrial Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0124|2023-02-02T22:59:15.110Z -- delta%20industrial%20automation -- dopsoft
item.description: Delta Electronics DOPSoft versions 4.00.16.22 and prior are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code when a malformed file is introduced to the software.

item.title: CVE-2023-0123|2023-02-02T22:57:48.508Z -- delta%20industrial%20automation -- dopsoft
item.description: Delta Electronics DOPSoft versions 4.00.16.22 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code when a malformed file is introduced to the software.

item.title: CVE-2023-4685|2023-09-07T17:49:44.667Z -- delta%20industrial%20automation -- cncsoft-b%20dopsoft
item.description: Delta Electronics' CNCSoft-B version 1.0.0.4 and DOPSoft versions 4.0.0.82 and prior are vulnerable to stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
